name: Celestial Fire
description: Sends out a spiral of three explosive Solar energy blasts.

name: Phoenix Dive
description: Dive to the ground and create a healing burst.

name: Incinerator Snap
description: Snap your fingers to create a fan of burning sparks.

name: Chain Lightning
description: Release a bolt of lightning that chains to nearby enemies.

name: Ball Lightning
description: Throw a Arc ball that zaps enemies.

name: Arc Web
description: Melee strikes chain Arc damage.

name: Entropic Pull
description: Drains energy from enemies and pulls them closer.

name: Pocket Singularity
description: Creates a Void explosion that weakens enemies.

name: Devour Strike
description: Defeating enemies heals you and grants grenade energy.

name: Penumbral Blast
description: Send out a freezing projectile that slows targets.

name: Hammer Strike
description: Strike an enemy with a hammer that ignites and weakens them.

name: Throwing Hammer
description: Throw a hammer that can be picked up to recharge melee.

name: Consecration
description: Slide then melee to launch and slam with Solar energy.

name: Seismic Strike
description: Shoulder charge that deals Arc damage.

name: Ballistic Slam
description: Leap into the air and slam down with Arc energy.

name: Thunderclap
description: Hold melee to charge a powerful Arc punch.

name: Shield Bash
description: Charge forward with Void energy, granting overshield.

name: Shield Throw
description: Throw your Void shield that ricochets between enemies.

name: Offensive Bulwark
description: Melee hits with overshield grant ability energy.

name: Shiver Strike
description: Charge forward and shatter enemies with Stasis.

name: Weighted Knife
description: Throw a knife that does precision damage and can refund on kill.

name: Knife Trick
description: Throw a fan of knives that burn enemies.

name: Proximity Knife
description: Throw an explosive knife that detonates near enemies.

name: Combination Blow
description: Melee kills increase damage and restore health.

name: Disorienting Blow
description: Strike that disorients enemies.

name: Tempest Strike
description: Slide then melee to launch an Arc wave.

name: Smoke Bomb
description: Throw a smoke bomb that grants invisibility.

name: Snare Bomb
description: Throw a trap that slows and damages enemies.

name: Withering Blade
description: Throw Stasis shurikens that slow and ricochet.

name: Threaded Spike
description: Throw a rope dart that suspends targets.

name: Ensnaring Slam
description: Slam down from the air to suspend nearby enemies.

name: Frenzied Blade
description: Perform a series of Strand melee strikes.

name: Arcane Needle
description: Fire a bolt of Strand energy that unravels targets.
